name: Grocery List
description:
Grocery List

Grocery List is a 2D matching game where you have to pick out the correct ingredients based on the grocery list given.

This project is built based on a larger project blueprint, provided by a research team from Nanyang Business School of Nanyang Technological University, to help detect early stages of Dementia. The intention for this game is to test and improve the players' complex attention.

What to do? Just drag and drop the ingredients from the conveyor belt to the basket!

Special Thanks to:

Prof Sharon Ng and Max Yu from Nanyang Business School of Nanyang Technological University for having me for this project.

Credits: 

BGM from OrangeFreeSound and Freesound.

Visual Element from Kenney and FreePik
